## DropErc1155ClaimConditions.getClaimerProofs() method

Returns allow list information and merkle proofs for the given address.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getClaimerProofs(tokenId: BigNumberish, claimerAddress: string, claimConditionId?: BigNumberish): Promise<SnapshotEntryWithProof | null>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter        | Type         | Description                                                             |
| ---------------- | ------------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| tokenId          | BigNumberish | the token ID to check                                                   |
| claimerAddress   | string       | the claimer address                                                     |
| claimConditionId | BigNumberish | <i>(Optional)</i> optional the claim condition id to get the proofs for |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;SnapshotEntryWithProof \| null&gt;
